segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool like it's a mountain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks like he's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall; that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not even trying to help him or warn him about the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how sneaky they're being while the woman is right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what they'll do if the woman catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, he's practically hanging off the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR
